graphs.query: dataSource.name='Azure Event Hub' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by app_name | sort -count
graphs.title: Events by Application

graphs.query: dataSource.name='Azure Event Hub' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by device.browser | sort -count
graphs.title: Events by Browser

graphs.query: dataSource.name='Azure Event Hub' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by device.os | sort -count
graphs.title: Events by Operating System

graphs.query: dataSource.name='Azure Event Hub' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by user.type | sort -count
graphs.title: Events by User Type

graphs.query: dataSource.name='Azure Event Hub' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by location.region | sort -count
graphs.title: Events by Region

graphs.query: dataSource.name='Azure Event Hub' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by location.country | sort -count
graphs.title: Events by Country
